info.name: info
info.usage: `n:info` - Posts the info of this bot.

exit.name: exit
exit.usage: `n:exit <time>` - After `time` seconds, the bot logs out.

help.name: help
help.usage: `n:help` **or** `a:help (command name)` - Get info for either all commands or a single one.

wiki.name: wiki
wiki.usage: `n:wiki <name> (search no.)` - Searches en.touhouwiki.net for name. If search no. exists, post the result of said number.

kick.name: kick
kick.usage: `n:kick <user> (reason)` - Kicks a user with the optional reason.
